data.fullContent: Plain cooked spinach is best served steamed or boiled in a minimum amount of water for no more than five minutes. The bulk of the leaves reduces enormously in cooking. Allow about 4 ounces per serving and use the biggest pan you have. Serve with lemon juice, or perhaps with salt.
data.answer: 煮熟的菠菜最好是用最少的水蒸或煮5分钟。在烹饪过程中，叶子的体积会大大减少。每份大约4盎司，用最大的平底锅。可以配柠檬汁，也可以加盐来食用。
